Package io.smudgr.util.source

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AnimatedSource
    The AnimatedSource interface defines behavior for manipulating the playback speed for a source that is changing frames in time with the application.
    Source
    The Source interface defines methods for interacting with a Frame input source.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Gif
    The Gif source loads an animate GIF and returns the current frame in time with the application.
    Image
    The Image source represents a static frame from a loaded image file (i.e.
    SourceSet
    The SourceSet source is a container of Source instances, which uses the current source's Source.getFrame() for the value of SourceSet.getFrame()
    Video
    The Video source loads a video file and returns the current frame of the video, in time with the application.
